title: Ticket #5586: startd crashes when claiming multiple claimed/idle slots
description: If ALLOW_PSLOT_PREEMPTION is enabled, and jobs are submitted with keep_claim_idle set to some non-zero number, and single-cpu jobs are run to completion, the startd correctly goes into Claimed/Idle state. If multiple-cpu jobs are then submitted with high enough rank to preempt the claimed/idle slots, the startd will crash.
